body.name: SAMSUNG S33A Series 24-Inch FHD 1080p Computer Monitor, HDMI, VA Panel, Wideview Screen, Eye Saver & Game Mode (LS24A336NHNXZA), Black
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 2 mins
features: A WIDER VIEW, CLEAR ALL AROUND: Everything remains vivid and clear from 178° all around—even up into the very corners; Whether you're standing up, sitting down, or peering over someone's shoulder, documents and graphics look consistently accurate.Mounting Type:Wall Mount (Size mm) 75.0 x 75.0.Aspect Ratio 16:9

EXPERIENCE TRUE DEFINITION: Samsung's innovative VA Panel technology delivers an outstanding 3000:1 contrast ratio with deeper blacks and more brilliant whites; Minimal light leaks from corner to corner, so even very dark or bright images are crystal clear on your screen

ALL DAY EYE CARE: Virtually eliminate eye strain for more comfortable extended computing with eye comfort technology; Flicker Free continuously removes irritating flicker, while Eye Saver Mode minimizes blue light; Protect your eyes, keep them fresh, and do more.

ESSENTIAL CONNECTIVITY: Link your monitor to external memory drives and other devices with HDMI and D-sub ports; Now, your computing environment is even more convenient with additional input possibilities

GAME MODE: Game Mode instantly optimizes screen contrast to give you a competitive edge during gameplay; By selectively boosting contrast in scenes, Game Mode reveals more detail in dark areas to let you spot your enemies faster
body.description: The Samsung S33A FHD monitor has a wide viewing angle and 3000:1 contrast ratio that gives you a clear, vivid display the whole way around. With Eye Saver, Flicker Free Technology and Game Mode, you can work and play with less strain and more efficiency. HDMI and D-Sub ports make connectivity easier. Wide 178° viewing angle keeps documents and graphics consistently accurate. Game Mode optimizes screen contrast to give player a competitive edge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gotta love this monitor
reviews.reviewText: I bought the SAMSUNG S33A Series 24-Inch Monitor to elevate my gaming setup, and let me tell you, it’s like I’ve been playing games with sunglasses on all these years. This screen is so bright and clear, I’m still not sure if I’m playing games or actually inside them – someone pinch me!The Eye Saver mode is a godsend; my eyes are now less fried than my favorite midnight snack. And the Game Mode? Well, it’s like having a secret weapon that makes everything look so good, I almost feel bad for my in-game enemies. Almost.The wide-view screen is perfect for multitasking. I can have my work on one side, a video playing on the other, and still manage to miss all my deadlines because, well, this screen makes procrastination a visually stunning experience.Overall, if you’re looking for a monitor that will make your digital content look so good you’ll want to invite friends over just to stare at your desktop wallpaper, this is the one. Plus, it’s a great conversation starter: “Hey, have you seen my monitor?” Boom, instant friendship.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Budget saving monitor and really good quality. May be not advanced model but for my son it is over the expectation. No any issue and easy to use and set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described.
reviews.reviewText: Great little monitor. Priced right and delivered quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great TV set. The color and clarity is very good. My living room is pretty large and I think a 55" inch set is the right size. You can't go wrong with a Sony tv. Samsung is good as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very simple and works well
reviews.reviewText: I don't think I've ever had one that was easier to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price. I just needed an extra monitor for the basics and it delivers. I like the ability to tilt the stand and still feels really stable at any angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The brightness is great and the clarity could not be better. It was so easy to install and the size is perfect for these aging eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Compatible with Mac. You just need a USB and HDMI cable which is not included.
